text: Amy Smart (born March 26, 1976) is an American actress and former fashion model. She played Julie Harbor in Varsity Blues (1999). She played Lillian Hart in Columbus Circle (2012). Smart was born in Topanga, California. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:Models from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Amy Smart
